Title: The Last Hammer Blow
Writer: Alix Delaporte (original scenario), Alain Le Henry (adaptation)
Actors: Romain Paul, Clotilde Hesme, Grégory Gadebois, Candela Peña
Plot: A 13-year old boy who lives with his single sick mom in a trailer near the beach, comes in contact with the father he never knew when the man performs as a conductor at the local music theater.
